column1:
Please grab the labeled 
 soil package 
 and place it on the target area 
 by choosing a method first. 
  
 Don't forget to press stop 
 after finishing this task.

Please grab the labeled 
 mozzarella cheese 
 and place it on the target area 
 by choosing a method first. 
  
 Don't forget to press stop 
 after finishing this task.

Please grab the labeled 
 banana 
 and place it on the target area 
 by choosing a method first. 
  
 Don't forget to press stop 
 after finishing this task.

Please grab the labeled 
 chips box 
 and place it on the target area. 
 
 Repeat this task with every 
 offered method. 

 Don't forget to press stop 
 after finishing this task.

Please grab the highlighted carton 
 on the side and place it on 
 the target area. 

 Repeat this task with 
 every offered method. 

 Press directly the Stop Button
 to finish each successful trial 
 and walk to the appearing red area 
 to continue with the study.

Please grab the labeled 
 lemon 
 and place it on the target area. 
 Your grabbing method is already set for you.  

 Repeat this task with every  
 offered method.  

 Press directly the Stop Button  
 to finish each successful trial and  
walk to the appearing red area  
 to continue with the study.

Please grab the highlighted 
 mushroom on the vegetable table and 
 place it on the target area. 

 Repeat this task with every 
 offered method. 
 
 Press directly the Stop Button 
 to finish each successful trial and 
 walk to the appearing red area 
 to continue with the study.
